This information was compiled as part of a larger system-wide effort to combine the many factors that influence coastal water quality. For more information on the NERRS Characteristics of Land Use and Ecosystems (CLUE) project, visit <https://www.nerra.org/swmp-clue/>.

```{r}
#| label: tbl-cmecs
#| tbl-cap: Coastal and Marine Ecological Standard CMECS Classifications for the four GTM Research Reserve long-term water quality monitoring stations, Pine Island gtmpiwq, San Sebastian gtmsswq, Fort Matanzas gtmfmwq, and Pellicer Creek gtmpcwq.

library(here)
library(kableExtra) 
library(readxl)

cmecs <- readxl::read_xlsx(here('data', 'cmecs.xlsx'))

cmecs |> kbl(align = "c") |> 
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) |> 
  row_spec(0, bold = T) |> 
  column_spec(1, border_right = T) |>
  kable_classic(c('striped', 'hover'), full_width = F)
```
